Questions.Text: Which is NOT a programming language?
What is the time complexity of binary search?
Explain the difference between RAM and ROM.
Questions.CorrectAnswer: RAM is volatile memory for temporary storage, ROM is non-volatile for permanent storage.

Questions.Text: Describe Object-Oriented Programming and its four main principles.
Questions.CorrectAnswer: OOP uses objects containing data and methods. Principles: Encapsulation, Abstraction, Inheritance, Polymorphism.
